name: Fruit Paradise (KIWI)
description:
Fruit paradise is a mini-game made by me in Game Maker 8 for a another video game style "Party" that was canceled in 2013, I decided made a new upgrade to mini-game because I don't want that it ended as a abandoned software.

The objective of mini-game is compete with other player in recollect apples and avoid spiders before the music ends, the player that obtain more score wins.

It's important to mention that mini-game cannot be played alone. (in this version) and the game is in Spanish but I think that no is necesary translated for play.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fruit paradise es un minijuego hecho por mi en Game Maker 8 para otro video juego estilo "Party" que fue cancelado en el 2013, yo decidi realizar una nueva version de esto porque yo no queria que terminara abandonado sin que nadie lo probara.

El objetivo del minijuego es competir con otro jugador en recolectar manzanas y esquivar a las arañas antes de que finalice la musica, al final el jugador que obtenga mas puntos gana.

Es importante mencionar que este minijuego no se puede jugar solo.
